fullplot: After a young woman is brutally killed by an intruder, her husband and father conspire with a mysterious desert dweller to awaken her from the dead. Soon after she awakens, she begins to realize that something is horribly wrong.
plot: After a young woman is brutally killed by an intruder, her husband and father conspire with a mysterious desert dweller to awaken her from the dead. Soon after she awakens, she begins to realize that something is horribly wrong.
title: Kiss the Abyss
